38 
39 import sys
40 
41 import rospy
42 
43 from rospy_tutorials.srv import AddTwoInts
44 
45 
48 def add_two_ints_client(x, y):
49  rospy.wait_for_service('add_two_ints')
50 
51  try:
52  # initialize ServiceProxy with extra header information.
53  # header is only exchanged on initial connection
54  metadata = { 'cookies' : 'peanut butter' }
55  add_two_ints = rospy.ServiceProxy('add_two_ints', AddTwoInts, headers=metadata)
56 
57  print("Requesting %s+%s with cookies=%s"%(x, y, metadata['cookies']))
58 
59  # simplified style
60  resp = add_two_ints(x, y)
61  print("Server's connection headers were", resp._connection_header)
62 
63  return resp.sum
64  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
65  print("Service call failed: %s"%e)
66 
67 def usage():
68  return "%s [x y]"%sys.argv[0]
69 
70 if __name__ == "__main__":
71 
72  if len(sys.argv) == 1:
73  import random
74  x = random.randint(-50000, 50000)
75  y = random.randint(-50000, 50000)
76  elif len(sys.argv) == 3:
77  try:
78  import string
79  x = string.atoi(sys.argv[1])
80  y = string.atoi(sys.argv[2])
81  except:
82  print(usage())
83  sys.exit(1)
84  else:
85  print(usage())
86  sys.exit(1)
87  print("%s + %s = %s"%(x, y, add_two_ints_client(x, y)))
